import React from 'react' export default function AddChild() { const[formData, setFormData] = React.useState({ childName: "", childUsername: "", childPassword: "", childConfirm: "" }) function handleChange(event) { const {name, value} = event.target; setFormData((prevFormData) => ({ ...prevFormData, [name]: value, })) } function handleSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault(); registerChild() } return (

Add Child
